fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Use 1 bee to see if someone is a beekeeper
-Use 2 bees to give a player basic protection for the night, and marking their attacker
-Use 3 bees to reroll someone into a beekeeper role

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You gain 1 bee every night
-You start the game with 1 bee
-You may use 2 actions at once
-You automatically convert players who are beekeeper roles, gaining their night chats and they now win with you and everyone else in the faction
-One other beekeeper role must spawn for you to be present
-If you use any ability on Humble Bumble Bumble Bee (2826) you will disable their ability for the next 2 nights. This ability overrides their ability suppression immunity. This attribute will never fail under any circumstances. You will not learn this. In the case of “Immovable object vs unstoppable force” this attribute will never count as the “unstoppable force”, therefore this attribute will never fail in any circumstance
